channel.title: Archives: May 2008 on Rootwork.org
channel.description: Recent content in Archives: May 2008 on Rootwork.org

item.title: NetSquared project interviews and session notes
item.description: Some really incredible presentations here at the NetSquared conference, both from featured projects and individual speakers. Seth Horwitz and I are busily collecting information for next Tuesday's Philly NetSquared event.

item.title: Hundreds gather for social change tech at NetSquared Year Three
item.description: The NetSquared Year Three conference has gotten off to a great start: Nonprofit staffers, activists, techies and funders gathering to talk about -- and award some money to -- using technology for social change.
